#summary How to install QT for Windows

Qt is cross-platform application framework for GUI development. Before start with Qt intallation check that [Installing_MinGW MinGW] is installed.

 # Download _qt-win-opensource-4.4.2-mingw.exe_ from the Trolltech website at http://www.trolltech.com/developer/downloads/qt/windows and execute it.
 # Accept the license agreement and click next.
 # Use the destination folder _C:\msys\usr\qt\_.
 # Point the installer to the install location of MinGW, _C:\MinGW_ and click install.

To create the debug libraries, go to Start->All Programs->Qt by Trolltech 4.2.1(Build Debug Libraries).

To continue with the resources intallation to Tonatiuh development, start with [Installing_Coin3d_for_Windows Coin3D] intallation.
